name: Ikujo!
description:
One day, an earthquake happened. The main character found himself inside a different world he don't know about, which where he found many monsters around him. The only way is going forward, to face all the challenges and obstacles waiting for him. Can he find his way back? Or will he disappear like the rest of his kind? Help the Hero to find a way out from the dungeon!

Game Control:

Arrow Key - Move

A - Attack

1 - Dodge

2 - Strong attack

Esc/x - menu

Z - interact

Attack has cooldown, so play carefully!
